ingredients: 2  avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced, 2  green onions, chopped, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon garlic, minced,   +   1/2  lime, juiced
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 19%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Sodium 238mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 10g 4%, Dietary Fiber 7g 25%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 14mg 68%, Calcium 27mg 2%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 532mg 11%
